name: Roids
description:
Somewhat faithful clone of the 1979 space shooter game asteroids.

Your mission is to destroy all asteroids in each sector. 

Shooting big asteroids will split them into smaller, faster moving asteroids.

Watch out for occasional UFO attacks!

=== CONTROLS ===
Start game - Space bar
Shoot - Z key
Rotate - L/R arrow key
Thrust - Up arrow key

=== SCORING ===
Big asteroid - 20
Medium asteroid - 50
Small asteroid - 100
Big UFO - 200
Small UFO - 1000
Extra life - At 10,000 points

=== INFO ===
Programming, design and graphics by Sami S.

I created this as a learning experience.

Graphics are are custom high-resolution vector graphic recreations in style of the original game which I (painstakingly) created in Affinity Designer.
